titles.title: No Iranian Energy Act
No Iranian Energy Act
To provide for the imposition of sanctions with respect to the importation of natural gas from Iran by the Government of Iraq.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Ways and Means, Oversight and Government Reform, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
